tasks.label: Run Unit Tests
tasks.command: docker exec -u dev mush-php php -d error_reporting="E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_USER_DEPRECATED" vendor/bin/codecept run tests/unit

tasks.label: Debug Unit Tests
tasks.command: docker exec -u dev mush-php bash -c 'XDEBUG_MODE=debug XDEBUG_SESSION=1 php -d error_reporting="E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_USER_DEPRECATED" vendor/bin/codecept run tests/unit'
